name: Ninja Impact (Wavering Systems)
description:
A turn, hex & combo based tactical game.

After playing the mobile game Hoplite, I've been looking for another alternative to avoid the boring "click on an enemy until he dies" gameplay. This is the result.

Enemies can't move during your combos. Select your combo pattern carefully before attacking or you might get trapped !

Completed for the "Finally Finish Something 2018" game jam.

21/01/2018 : now web-playable
